name: 賀一平
objective: The purpose of this course is to develop students into better, more mature, confident, competent, enthusiastic, reflective, independent learners. Young adult literature are used as major reading materials together with articles dealing with controversial issues. Activities encouraging students to adopt response strategies and transact with texts actively and aesthetically are provided to motivate students to read whole authentic texts and to improve their communication skills, reading strategies, listening strategies, response strategies, and critical thinking skills. These response-centered activities include journal writing, group discussion, individualized independent study, and guided reading. Authentic evaluation tools including journals and portfolios are used to evaluate student performance.
